entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CALM WINDS

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR, COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE MORNING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CALM WINDS

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
